overview.ovdesc:
WR WR.IMAGE.MANAGEMENT WR.IMAGE.MANAGEMENT
This table allows for management of document import into T24 from the T24 Private Wealth Management Client Reporting module.
The Client Reporting module creates records in this table via OFS to catalog .pdf documents within Image Management. This record can then be used to categorise the report documents so that they can be reported upon accordingly via an enquiry.

t.desc: This is either the customer, portfolio or account to which the .pdf report relates.
This is the status of the report - for information only.

Short Name of the report.
This will be used to populate the field 'Short Description' on IM.DOCUMENT.IMAGE.
This is the end date of the report - for information only.

This flag is set to 'YES' when Image Management tables are to be updated. On authorisation, the system creates WR.IMAGE.MANAGEMENT and a WR.IMAGE.UPLOAD record based on the information in this record. This can only happen once per record.

Description of the report.
This will be used to populate the field 'Description' on IM.DOCUMENT.IMAGE.
This is the file name for the .pdf report to which this Image Management record relates.
The record key for the WR.IMAGE.MANAGEMENT record. Defined in AUTO.ID.START for WM.REPORTING. Has no particular significance in terms of any other data in T24.

The original requestor of the report.
If the reports have been kicked off via a COB process, this will be the user record attached to the COB process itself.
If the reports have been run via an adhoc process by a user, this will be the user id for that particular user.
This field is only inputtable on the first instance of the record i.e. through OFS from the calling process.

Type of report i.e. the entity the report is based around.
Report types can be CUSTOMER, PORTFOLIO or ACCOUNT.

This is the account officer for the customer, portfolio or account defined in the Report Instance field. The account officer is defaulted from the CUSTOMER, SEC.ACC.MASTER or ACCOUNT record, but can be overridden here if the user decides to do so.
This is the start date of the report - for information only.
Fund manager for this customer, portfolio or account - free text field.

Document upload key. This is the IM.DOCUMENT.UPLOAD record created when 'Update Image' flag was set to YES and the record authorised. Once set, this cannot be changed.
System-generated field only.

desc.p: Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
